categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starfighter squadrons

nodes.text: Dagger Squadron was a starfighter squadron that served with the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War. The first unit to be equipped with the then-experimental B-wing starfighters, they were activated and sent into combat by Admiral Gial Ackbar in a last-ditch effort to save a unit of Rebels that had become trapped behind Imperial lines.
Hasbro released a Dagger Squadron B-wing toy, with a figure of Pollard as a Toys 'R Us exclusive, in the summer of 2008.
